<Heading
  as={"h1"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/public/branding/{tenant_slug}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint is public (no authentication required) and used by login pages.
Results are cached for 5 minutes.
